dotnetType.name: TimestampDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" />
            or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" /> and attempts to map them to
            <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new timestamp deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TimestampResolution" /> and the
            schemaâ€™s logical type is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.TimestampLogicalType" />; an unsuccessful result
            otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a timestamp deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimestampDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
